description: Sabaragamuwa Provincial Council - Appointing Hon. Saman Wickrama Wickramarachchi to inquire and submit a report regarding functions of the Chairman of the Mawanella P/S and suspending Mr. P. P. Wickramasinghe functioning as the Chairman of Mawanella P/S; and ordering Mr. Mohomed Sally Mohomed Kamel, Deputy Chairman to execute the powers and carryout the tasks of Chairman
